contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary}} '''Hume''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} == People == {{seealso|Home (disambiguation)#People}} <!--people with the surname are listed at [[Hume (surname)]]; include here only persons commonly referred to as only "Hume" --> * [[Hume (surname)]] * [[David Hume]], a Scottish philosopher, economist and historian * [[Hamilton Hume]], explorer of Australia * [[Allan Octavian Hume]] civil servant, political reformer, amateur ornithologist and horticulturalist in British India. * [[Hume Cronyn]], Canadian actor and son of the politician * [[Hume Cronyn (politician)]], Canadian politician and father of the actor == In fiction == * Hume (see [[Ivalice]]), the name of the Human race in the computer role playing game series ''Final Fantasy'' * [[Desmond Hume]], a fictional character on the television series ''Lost'' * Nick Hume, the protagonist of [[Death Sentence (2007 film)|''Death Sentence'' (film)]] == Places == ;Australia * [[Hume, Australian Capital Territory]], a suburb of Canberra * the [[City of Hume]], a municipality in northern Melbourne * [[Division of Hume]], an electoral district in the Australian House of Representatives, in New South Wales * the [[Greater Hume Shire Council]], a municipality in rural New South Wales * any of several prominent landmarks named after Hamilton Hume: ** the [[Hume Highway]], the main road between Melbourne and Sydney ** [[Lake Hume]], a large artificial lake and the associated Hume Dam ;Scotland * [[Hume Castle]], the historic 13th century eponymous fortress of the Home/Hume family in Berwickshire, Scotland * [[Hume, Scottish Borders]] ;United States * [[Hume, California (disambiguation)]], multiple locations * [[Hume, Illinois]], in Edgar County * [[Hume, Missouri]] * [[Hume, New York]] * [[Hume, Virginia]] * [[Hume Township, Whiteside County, Illinois]] * [[Hume Township, Michigan]] * [[Hume Lake]], in California == Other uses == * [[Hume (soil)]], a type of soil * [[Hume (language)]] (Higher-order Unified Meta-Environment), a computer programming language == See also == * {{lookfrom|Hume}} * {{intitle|Hume}} {{disambig}}
